task.title: Create a Geofence Group
task.shortdesc: Fence groups enable you to assign employees to geofences. Employees can be assigned to more than one fence.

step.cmd: Enter a name for the geofence group.
If applicable, enter a description and start and end dates.

Click in the Members field to select the team, or select Add All Employees. You can also select to search for an employee. If employees leave a team, they are still part of this fence group until you remove that team name and select it again.
Select Save. The geofence group is listed on the Geofence Groups page, but geofences are not associated with the group; “None” appears in the Geofences column.
From the Actions column, select Manage Geofences to open the Manage Geofences page where you can select the geofences for this group and then selectSave.
step.info: To edit or delete a geofence group, select the appropriate option from the Actions column on the Geofence Groups page.
